rooms.description: A spacious entrance hall with a North-facing door aligned to positive energy as per Vastu principles.
An open and airy living room designed in Scandinavian minimalistic style with natural light from multiple windows, north exposure ensuring a serene ambience.
A modern kitchen integrated with the living area following Scandinavian design principles and built-in storage solutions, optimized for functional luxury.
An elegant dining space adjacent to the kitchenette with natural light and a north-facing outlook to enhance positive energy according to Vastu.
A luxurious master bedroom featuring ample closet space and a private balcony with serene north exposure for better rest.
A modern Scandinavian-themed bedroom designed for privacy and relaxation, with adequate natural lighting.
An additional guest bedroom incorporating Scandinavian design elements and north-facing windows to maintain positive energy flow.
A spa-like master bathroom with a minimalist design reflecting Scandinavian aesthetics.
A compact common washroom area strategically placed to serve all bedrooms.
An immersive home theater room designed with soundproof walls and ambient lighting for a premium viewing experience.

openings.description: The main entrance is located on the north side to maximize positive Vastu energy and natural light.
Large, strategically placed windows throughout to ensure ample natural light in accordance with Scandinavian design aesthetics.

special_features.description: A private gym integrated into the ground floor space featuring modern fitness equipment and soundproofing for uninterrupted workouts.
An elegant library with built-in bookshelves and comfortable seating area designed for quiet reading and relaxation.
